name: 4-aminobenzoate,NADPH:oxygen oxidoreductase (1-hydroxylating, decarboxylating)
definition: 4-Aminobenzoate + Oxygen + NADPH + H+ <=> 4-Hydroxyaniline + CO2 + NADP+ + H2O
